review: Wonderful doctor...very cordial, and listened very attentively and explained everything to us. The treatment was meticulous and his vast experience showed. Would strongly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hello everyone,

Trust me Dr Saumitra Sircar is gem of a surgeon. 

I have already done my ACL surgery and my mother's knee replacement surgery under his care and expertise. I am also planning  to take his opinion in case of any further problems or my injuries.

My rehabilitation and recovery was excellent and the surgery was very successful because of his guidance, expertise and personal care.

I am an amateur athlete who received tremendous support from my Dr Sircar's side during my pre and post-operative period so that I can recover and get back to my training as fast and safe as possible.

I highly recommend him to any general patient or athlete because of his experience, behaviour, personal care and support and benevolent behaviour.

Thank you so much Dr Saumitra Sircar for your help and support.



Thanks and regards,
Mriganka Bhattacharya

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Foot Pain,Bone Fracture,Lower Back Pain,Joint Pain,Knee Pain,
review: My family is happy from ortho related treatments for the last 3 yrs under him.He is a very good person.** ******* * ******** ******** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ******* ** *** ***** ** ************ He is like our family doctor. For each and every cases of Orthopaedic related issues( Bone Fracture, Knee pain, Neck pain,Arthiritis and others ) ,we are taking his consultation only.As per my understading  he is giving very less medication and instead of that prescribing proper surgical instrument for most of the cases which is very fruitful.Also number of visits is also less.As for e.g . for mother's case(age 60),  she is totally free from knee pain since 2019 after taking just one injection. My in laws surgery was done with 100% success rate with very minimum cost.My mother is now totally happy with all of her ortho related ailments ( arthritis, Tennis elbow, Fore finger pain etc ) after following his guidelines.Compare to some other doctor, He has different identity , according to me.I am recommending him to everybody for all ortho related ailments.

tags: None
review: The doctor was very nice *** *************. His attitude was very polite and he understood me issue and had given appropriate solution. I would recommend him to everyone. However, the receptionist's behaviour at the Health Check clinic is very rude. She should learn how to speak to people.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The doctor explained with the causes and effects of my health condition. He also discussed  the kind of medication I would  require. He was very patient and I felt comfortable discussing  my problems with him. In fact, he even called back (as the video call suddenly ended) since he thought that our conversation was cut short. It was my first-ever experience with online consultation and a good one.
